17namespace v8 {
18namespace internal {
19
20void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::MessageDetails::SetString(
21 int index, Handle<String> string, Isolate* isolate) {
22 DCHECK_NE(args_[index].type, kMainThreadHandle);
23 args_[index].type = kMainThreadHandle;
24 args_[index].js_string = string;
25}
26
27void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::MessageDetails::SetString(
28 int index, Handle<String> string, LocalIsolate* isolate) {
29 DCHECK_NE(args_[index].type, kMainThreadHandle);
30 args_[index].type = kMainThreadHandle;
31 args_[index].js_string = isolate->heap()->NewPersistentHandle(string);
32}
33
34template <typename IsolateT>
35void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::MessageDetails::Prepare(
36 IsolateT* isolate) {
37 for (int i = 0; i < kMaxArgumentCount; i++) {
38 switch (args_[i].type) {
39 case kAstRawString:
40 SetString(i, args_[i].ast_string->string(), isolate);
41 break;
42 case kNone:
43 case kConstCharString:
44 // We can delay allocation until ArgString(isolate).
45 break;
46
47 case kMainThreadHandle:
48 // The message details might already be prepared, so skip them if this
49 // is the case.
50 break;
51 }
52 }
53}
54
55Handle<String> PendingCompilationErrorHandler::MessageDetails::ArgString(
56 Isolate* isolate, int index) const {
57 // `index` may be >= argc; in that case we return a default value to pass on
58 // elsewhere.
59 DCHECK_LT(index, kMaxArgumentCount);
60 switch (args_[index].type) {
61 case kMainThreadHandle:
62 return args_[index].js_string;
63 case kNone:
64 return Handle<String>::null();
65 case kConstCharString:
66 return isolate->factory()
67 ->NewStringFromUtf8(base::CStrVector(args_[index].c_string),
68 AllocationType::kOld)
69 .ToHandleChecked();
70 case kAstRawString:
71 UNREACHABLE();
72 }
73}
74
75MessageLocation PendingCompilationErrorHandler::MessageDetails::GetLocation(
76 Handle<Script> script) const {
77 return MessageLocation(script, start_position_, end_position_);
78}
79
80void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::ReportMessageAt(int start_position,
81 int end_position,
82 MessageTemplate message,
83 const char* arg) {
84 if (has_pending_error_ && end_position >= error_details_.start_pos()) return;
85
86 has_pending_error_ = true;
87
88 error_details_ = MessageDetails(start_position, end_position, message, arg);
89}
90
91void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::ReportMessageAt(int start_position,
92 int end_position,
93 MessageTemplate message,
94 const AstRawString* arg) {
95 if (has_pending_error_ && end_position >= error_details_.start_pos()) return;
96
97 has_pending_error_ = true;
98
99 error_details_ = MessageDetails(start_position, end_position, message, arg);
100}
101
102void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::ReportMessageAt(int start_position,
103 int end_position,
104 MessageTemplate message,
105 const AstRawString* arg0,
106 const char* arg1) {
107 if (has_pending_error_ && end_position >= error_details_.start_pos()) return;
108
109 has_pending_error_ = true;
110 error_details_ =
111 MessageDetails(start_position, end_position, message, arg0, arg1);
112}
113
114void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::ReportMessageAt(
115 int start_position, int end_position, MessageTemplate message,
116 const AstRawString* arg0, const AstRawString* arg1, const char* arg2) {
117 if (has_pending_error_ && end_position >= error_details_.start_pos()) return;
118
119 has_pending_error_ = true;
120 error_details_ =
121 MessageDetails(start_position, end_position, message, arg0, arg1, arg2);
122}
123
124void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::ReportWarningAt(int start_position,
125 int end_position,
126 MessageTemplate message,
127 const char* arg) {
128 warning_messages_.emplace_front(
129 MessageDetails(start_position, end_position, message, arg));
130}
131
132template <typename IsolateT>
133void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::PrepareWarnings(IsolateT* isolate) {
134 DCHECK(!has_pending_error());
135
136 for (MessageDetails& warning : warning_messages_) {
137 warning.Prepare(isolate);
138 }
139}
140template void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::PrepareWarnings(Isolate* isolate);
141template void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::PrepareWarnings(
142 LocalIsolate* isolate);
143
144void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::ReportWarnings(
145 Isolate* isolate, Handle<Script> script) const {
146 DCHECK(!has_pending_error());
147
148 for (const MessageDetails& warning : warning_messages_) {
149 MessageLocation location = warning.GetLocation(script);
150 Handle<String> argument = warning.ArgString(isolate, 0);
151 DCHECK_LT(warning.ArgCount(), 2); // Arg1 is only used for errors.
152 Handle<JSMessageObject> message =
153 MessageHandler::MakeMessageObject(isolate, warning.message(), &location,
154 argument, Handle<FixedArray>::null());
155 message->set_error_level(v8::Isolate::kMessageWarning);
156 MessageHandler::ReportMessage(isolate, &location, message);
157 }
158}
159
160template <typename IsolateT>
161void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::PrepareErrors(
162 IsolateT* isolate, AstValueFactory* ast_value_factory) {
163 if (stack_overflow()) return;
164
165 DCHECK(has_pending_error());
166 // Internalize ast values for throwing the pending error.
167 ast_value_factory->Internalize(isolate);
168 error_details_.Prepare(isolate);
169}
170template EXPORT_TEMPLATE_DEFINE(
171 V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE) void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::
172 PrepareErrors(Isolate* isolate, AstValueFactory* ast_value_factory);
173template EXPORT_TEMPLATE_DEFINE(
174 V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE) void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::
175 PrepareErrors(LocalIsolate* isolate, AstValueFactory* ast_value_factory);
176
177void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::ReportErrors(Isolate* isolate,
178 Handle<Script> script) const {
179 if (stack_overflow()) {
180 isolate->StackOverflow();
181 } else {
182 DCHECK(has_pending_error());
183 ThrowPendingError(isolate, script);
184 }
185}
186
187void PendingCompilationErrorHandler::ThrowPendingError(
188 Isolate* isolate, Handle<Script> script) const {
189 if (!has_pending_error_) return;
190
191 MessageLocation location = error_details_.GetLocation(script);
192 int num_args = 0;
193 DirectHandle<Object> args[MessageDetails::kMaxArgumentCount];
194 for (; num_args < MessageDetails::kMaxArgumentCount; ++num_args) {
195 args[num_args] = error_details_.ArgString(isolate, num_args);
196 if (args[num_args].is_null()) break;
197 }
198 isolate->debug()->OnCompileError(script);
199
200 Factory* factory = isolate->factory();
201 Handle<JSObject> error = factory->NewSyntaxError(
202 error_details_.message(), base::VectorOf(args, num_args));
203 isolate->ThrowAt(error, &location);
204}
205
206Handle<String> PendingCompilationErrorHandler::FormatErrorMessageForTest(
207 Isolate* isolate) {
208 error_details_.Prepare(isolate);
209 int num_args = 0;
210 DirectHandle<Object> args[MessageDetails::kMaxArgumentCount];
211 for (; num_args < MessageDetails::kMaxArgumentCount; ++num_args) {
212 args[num_args] = error_details_.ArgString(isolate, num_args);
213 if (args[num_args].is_null()) break;
214 }
215 return MessageFormatter::Format(isolate, error_details_.message(),
216 base::VectorOf(args, num_args));
217}
